$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/history
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/history.text:
Full change log  https://kookma.github.io/TW-Trashbin/#ChangeLog

* ''1.2.2'' -- 2020.04.10 -- bug fix in remove draft tiddlers to trashbin
* ''1.2.1'' -- 2020.03.30 -- bug fix and doc improvement and UI fade correction
* ''1.1.2'' -- 2020.03.28 -- stable release with new features and bug fixes
* ''0.1.0'' -- 2019.02.12 -- mature public release

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/bulk-o.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/bulk-operation
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/bulk-o.text:
\define delete-trashed-tiddlers()
<$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]search:title[$:/trashbin/]]" variable="Item">
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<Item>> />
</$list>
\end

\define trashbin-empty-bin()
<$macrocall $name="trashbin-confirm-delete"
btnLabel="Empty Trashbin"
countFilter="[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]search:title[$:/trashbin/]]"
actionMacro=<<delete-trashed-tiddlers>>
stateTiddler="$:/state/trashbin/emptyTrashBin"
/>
\end

\define restore-all()
<$button tooltip="Restore all" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/recycle}}
<$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]search:title[$:/trashbin/]sort[]]" variable="Item">
<$macrocall $name="restore" tiddler=<<Item>> />
</$list>
</$button>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/confir.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/confirm-empty
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/confir.text:
\define trashbin-confirm-delete( btnLabel:"Delete these tiddlers", confirmMessage:"Are you sure you wish to delete", stateTiddler:"", countFilter:"", actionMacro:"") <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty Trashbin" popup=<> > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes">
<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter=<<__countFilter__>> />"""> $confirmMessage$ <> tiddler(s)?
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty archive" actions=<<__actionMacro__>> > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} Delete all?
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/move-t.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/move-to-trashbin
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/move-t.text:
\define trashTidName() <<unusedtitle baseName:"$(trashTiddler)$">>

\define move-to-trashbin(tiddler)
<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>has[title]]" variable=ignore> <!-- ignore missing tiddlers -->
<$vars trashTiddler={{{ [<__tiddler__>addprefix[$:/trashbin/]] }}}>
<$wikify name="trashTid" text=<<trashTidName>> >
<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>fields[]]" variable="fieldName">
<$action-setfield 
 $tiddler=<<trashTid>>
 $index=<<fieldName>>
 $value={{{[<__tiddler__>get<fieldName>] }}}
/>
</$list>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<trashTid>> tags="$:/tags/trashbin"/>
</$wikify>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<__tiddler__>> />
<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>has[draft.of]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> />""">
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{[<__tiddler__>get[draft.of]]}}} /><!--delete main tiddler-->
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> /> <!--delete draft tiddler-->
</$list>
</$vars>
</$list>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/previe.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/preview-option
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/previe.text:
\define viewTemplateTid() $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/viewtemplate/trash-item
\define styleTid()        $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/show-trashed

\define preview-option()
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<viewTemplateTid>> stateField="tags" text="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" default="">
<$button setTitle=<<viewTemplateTid>> setField="tags" setTo="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Show trash item preview"> 
{{$:/core/images/preview-open}}
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<styleTid>>  tags="$:/tags/Stylesheet"/> 
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<viewTemplateTid>> stateField="tags" text="$:/tags/ViewTemplate" default="">
<$button setTitle=<<viewTemplateTid>> setField="tags" setTo="" class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Hide trash item preview"> 
{{$:/core/images/preview-closed}}
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<styleTid>>  tags=""/> 
</$button>
</$reveal>
\end

<<preview-option>>

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restor.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restore
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restor.text:
\define open-restoredTid-in-story-river()
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/StoryList"    $field='list'  $subfilter="""[[$(restoredTid)$]]+[putfirst[]]"""/>
\end

\define restoreTid(tiddler)
<$list filter="[<__tiddler__>indexes[]] -title" variable="fieldName">
 <$action-setfield 
   $tiddler=<<restoredTid>> 
	 $field=<<fieldName>> 
	 $value={{{ [<__tiddler__>getindex<fieldName>] }}} 
 />
</$list>
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<__tiddler__>> />
<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> />
<$macrocall $name="open-restoredTid-in-story-river" />
\end


\define restore(tiddler)
<$vars 
  restoredTid={{{ [<__tiddler__>getindex[title]] }}} 
  isExisted= {{{ [<__tiddler__>getindex[title]has[title]] }}} 
  >
<$reveal type="nomatch" text=<<isExisted>> default=<<restoredTid>> >
<$macrocall $name="restoreTid" tiddler=<<__tiddler__>> />
</$reveal>

<$reveal type="match" text=<<isExisted>> default=<<restoredTid>> >
  <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" 
   $param="$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/restore-notification" 
	 restoredTiddler=<<restoredTid>>
	/>
</$reveal>

</$vars>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/sort.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/sort
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/sort.text:
\define tempSortTid() $:/keepstate/trashbin/sort

\define show-icons()
<$vars state-alpha-down="sortan[title]" state-alpha-up="!sortan[title]"
       state-numeric-down="sort[modified]" state-numeric-up="!sort[modified]" >
<$list filter="[<tempSortTid>get[text]match<state-alpha-down>]">
{{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/sort-alpha-down}}
</$list>
<$list filter="[<tempSortTid>get[text]match<state-alpha-up>]">
{{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/sort-alpha-up}}
</$list>
<$list filter="[<tempSortTid>get[text]match<state-numeric-down>]">
{{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/sort-numeric-down}}
</$list>
<$list filter="[<tempSortTid>get[text]match<state-numeric-up>]">
{{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/sort-numeric-up}}
</$list>
<$list filter="[<tempSortTid>!has[title]]">
Click to sort
</$list>
</$vars>
\end


\define trashbin-cycle(arraySet:"", stateTiddler:"", stateField:"text")
<$vars array=<<__arraySet__>>  currentItem={{{[<__stateTiddler__>get<__stateField__>]}}} 
       tooltip={{{[<tempSortTid>get[text]]}}} >
 <$button tooltip=<<tooltip>> class="tc-btn-invisible"> <<show-icons>>
    <$set
      filter='[enlist<array>after<currentItem>]'
      name=NextItem
      emptyValue={{{[enlist<array>first[]]}}}
    >
    <$action-setfield
     $tiddler=<<__stateTiddler__>>
     $field=<<__stateField__>>
     $value=<<NextItem>> />
      </$set>
  </$button>
</$vars>	
\end

\define sort-by()
<$macrocall $name="trashbin-cycle" 
  arraySet="sortan[title] !sortan[title] sort[modified] !sort[modified]" 
  stateTiddler=<<tempSortTid>> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/readme.text:
; Trashbin
The concept behind Trashbin plugin is to have a simple mechanism to move deleted tiddlers to Trashbin and be able to restore them later if required.

; Code and demo
For learning plugin features, mechanism, terminology, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Trashbin/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Trashbin

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/restore-notif.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/restore-notification
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/restore-notif.text:
{{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/recycle}} ''Warning''
The target tiddler <$text text=<>/> already exists.
It cannot be overwritten!

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/main.c.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/main.css

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/toolba.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/toolbar-buttons
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/toolba.text:
html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-controls .tc-image-trash-alt {stroke: white;fill:#660000;}
html body.tc-body .tc-tiddler-controls .tc-image-recycle   {stroke: white;fill:#138808;}

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/trashe.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/trashed-item
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/styles/trashe.text:
/* set style for trashed tiddlers */
[data-tags ~="$:/tags/trashbin"] { border: 1px solid crimson; }

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/templates/bod.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/templates/body
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/templates/bod.text:
\define show-plain() 
<$transclude index="text" mode="block"/>
\end \define show()
<$transclude index="text" mode="block"/>
\end <$list filter="[getindex[type]match[application/json]]" variable=ignore> <$list filter="[getindex[plugin-type]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage=<> >
This tiddler contains plugin!
<$list filter="[getindex[type]match[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]] [getindex[type]match[text/plain]] [getindex[type]match[text/css]]" variable=ignore> <> <$list filter="[getindex[type]]" variable=type emptyMessage=<> > <$list filter="[match[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]" variable=ignore> <$transclude index="text" mode="block"/> <$list filter="[search:title[image]]" variable=ignore>
This tiddler contains image data!

<$list filter="[{##title}!prefix[$:/]]">

<$view field="title"/>

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.caption: Trashbin
$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/sidebar.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/sort \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/restore \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/confirm-empty \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/bulk-operation \import $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/macros/preview-option \define show-link() <$link to=<> ><$text text={{{ [removeprefix[$:/trashbin/]] }}} />  <$view field="modified" format="date" template="0MM/0DD/YYYY 0hh:0mm AM"/> \end \define recycle-button() {{||$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-button}} \end \define delete-button() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Delete permanently"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/images/times.svg}} <$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title>]" variable=ignore> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define trashbin-siderbar-ui()
<> <> <> <>   <$list filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]limit[1]]' variable=null emptyMessage="Trash bin is empty"> <$count filter='[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]]'/> items in Trashbin <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/trashbin]prefix[$:/trashbin/]$(sortType)$]">
<>
<>
<>
\end <$vars sortType={{{[get[text]] ~[[]] }}}> <>

$:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-bu.title: $:/plugins/kookma/trashbin/ui/toolbar-button
